Smart Hairbrush: A hairbrush with built-in sensors that can analyze the health of your hair, detect damage, and suggest the right hair care routine to keep your hair healthy.
Hairbrush with a built-in detangling spray: A hairbrush with a built-in detangling spray that automatically sprays when you start brushing your hair, to prevent breakage and damage.
Hairbrush with a built-in hair straightener: A hairbrush with a built-in hair straightener that can straighten your hair as you brush it, saving you time and effort.
Hairbrush with a built-in scalp massager: A hairbrush with a built-in scalp massager that can massage your scalp as you brush your hair, to promote blood flow and healthy hair growth.
Hairbrush with a built-in hair dryer: A hairbrush with a built-in hair dryer that can dry your hair as you brush it, saving you time and effort.
